Parameter.value: root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name = '_Total'

PluginResultMetaInfo.columns: 应用名,消耗时间（分钟）,状态,授权ID,IP地址,SQL语句

Parameter.value: select substr(appl_name,1,15) as appl_name,elapsed_time_min as elapsed_min, appl_status as status, substr(authid,1,10) as auth_id,substr(inbound_comm_address,1,15) as ip_address, substr(stmt_text,1,30) as sql_statement from sysibmadm.long_running_sql order by 2 desc fetch first 10 rows only

PluginResultMetaInfo.columns: 执行次数,平均执行时间（秒）,排序次数,平均排序次数,SQL语句

Parameter.value: select num_executions as num_exec,average_execution_time_s as avg_time_sec,stmt_sorts as num_sorts,sorts_per_execution as sorts_per_stmt,substr(stmt_text,1,300) as sql_stmt from sysibmadm.top_dynamic_sql where num_executions>0 order by 1 desc fetch first 10 rows only with ur

PluginResultMetaInfo.columns: 排序语句,执行排序,SQL语句

Parameter.value: select stmt_sorts,sorts_per_execution as sorts_execution,substr(stmt_text,1,300) as stmt_text from sysibmadm.top_dynamic_sql where stmt_sorts>0 order by stmt_sorts desc fetch first 10 rows only

PluginResultMetaInfo.columns: 授权ID,应用名,行选择百分比（%）

Parameter.value: select authid ,appl_name,percent_rows_selected from sysibmadm.appl_performance order by percent_rows_selected fetch first 10 rows only with ur
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;cat /var/run/dmesg.boot | grep -i "real memory" | awk '{printf "%d",$4/1024}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;cat /var/run/dmesg.boot | grep -i "real memory" | awk '{printf "%d",$4/1024}'
root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Thread where Name like 'db2%'
root\cimv2::select name from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name !='_Total'

select distinct svcename from table(sysfun.get_dbm_config()) as dbmcfg
select rem_cons_in from sysibmadm.snapdbm with ur
select REM_CONS_IN+LOCAL_CONS from sysibmadm.snapdbm with ur
select LOCAL_CONS from sysibmadm.snapdbm with ur
select AGENTS_REGISTERED from sysibmadm.snapdbm SNAPSHOT_DBM with ur
select agents_registered-idle_agents as agents_register from sysibmadm.snapdbm with ur
select idle_agents from sysibmadm.snapdbm with ur
select rollback_sql_stmts/(rollback_sql_stmts+commit_sql_stmts)*100 from TABLE(SYSPROC.SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${dbName}',-2)) AS SNAPSHOT_DATABASE with ur
SELECT TOTAL_LOG_USED_KB FROM SYSIBMADM.LOG_UTILIZATION with ur
select total_physical_reads from SYSIBMADM.bp_read_io where bp_name not like '%K'
select total_writes from SYSIBMADM.bp_write_io where bp_name not like '%K'
select sum(POOL_DATA_L_READS) from TABLE(SNAPSHOT_BP( '${childid}',-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
Select sum(POOL_INDEX_L_READS) from TABLE(SNAPSHOT_BP( '${childid}',-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
select sum(POOL_DATA_P_READS) from TABLE(SNAPSHOT_BP( '${childid}',-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
select sum(POOL_INDEX_P_READS) from TABLE(SNAPSHOT_BP( '${childid}',-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
select sum(POOL_DATA_L_READS), sum(POOL_DATA_P_READS) from TABLE( SNAPSHOT_BP('${childid}',-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
select sum(POOL_INDEX_L_READS), sum(POOL_INDEX_P_READS) from TABLE( SNAPSHOT_BP('${childid}',-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
select CAT_CACHE_LOOKUPS,CAT_CACHE_INSERTS from TABLE( SNAPSHOT_DATABASE( '${childid}', -1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
select PKG_CACHE_LOOKUPS,PKG_CACHE_INSERTS from TABLE( SNAPSHOT_DATABASE( '${childid}', -1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
Select sum(DIRECT_READS) from TABLE( SNAPSHOT_BP('${childid}' ,-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
Select sum(DIRECT_WRITES) from TABLE(SNAPSHOT_BP( '${childid}', -1 )) as SNAPSHOT_BP
select count(*) FROM TABLE( SNAPSHOT_APPL('${childid}' ,-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_APPL
SELECT DEADLOCKS FROM TABLE( SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${childid}' ,-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
SELECT LOCK_WAITS FROM TABLE( SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${childid}', -1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
SELECT LOCK_ESCALS FROM TABLE( SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${childid}', -1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
SELECT TOTAL_SORTS FROM TABLE( SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${childid}' ,-1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
SELECT TOTAL_SORTS,SORT_OVERFLOWS FROM TABLE(SNAPSHOT_DATABASE( '${childid}', -1 )) as SNAPSHOT_DATABASE
SELECT sum(FAILED_SQL_STMTS) FROM TABLE(SYSPROC.SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${childid}',-2)) AS SNAPSHOT_DATABASE with ur
SELECT sum(COMMIT_SQL_STMTS)+sum(ROLLBACK_SQL_STMTS)+sum(INT_COMMITS)+sum(INT_ROLLBACKS) FROM TABLE(SYSPROC.SNAPSHOT_DATABASE('${childid}',-2)) AS SNAPSHOT_DATABASE with ur
select lock_list_in_use from sysibmadm.snapdb where db_name='${childid}' with ur
select (locks_waiting/APPLS_CUR_CONS)*100 from sysibmadm.snapdb where db_name='${childid}' with ur
select tablespace_name, tablespace_id from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where TABLESPACE_TYPE=0
select tablespace_name from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where TABLESPACE_TYPE=0
select tablespace_name, page_size*total_pages/1024/1024 tablespace_size from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where tablespace_type=0
select tablespace_name, TABLESPACE_STATE from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where tablespace_type=0
select tablespace_name, decimal(round(USED_PAGES*1.0/TOTAL_PAGES*100,2),10,2) pct from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where tablespace_type=0 and total_pages!=0
select tablespace_name, tablespace_id from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where TABLESPACE_TYPE=1
select tablespace_name from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where TABLESPACE_TYPE=1
select tablespace_name, page_size*total_pages/1024 tablespace_size from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where tablespace_type=1
select tablespace_name, TABLESPACE_STATE from table(snapshot_tbs_cfg('${dbName}',-1)) as snapshot_tbs_cfg where tablespace_type=1
